shortdesc.ph: Stops the media stream relay. Once the relay stops, the host quits all the destination channels.

section.p: After this method call, the SDK triggers the following callbacks: If it reports (0) and (0), it means that the media stream has stopped forwarding.
section.note: If the method call is unsuccessful, the SDK will trigger a callback and report the status code (2) or (8). You can call the method to leave the channel, and the cross-channel media stream forwarding will automatically stop.
